Dip your hand into the paste to create gloves and leave it on for several minutes before washing it away. (B) Put cold milk on your hands. Then pour ice-cold milk into a bowl and add some flour to create a paste. Dip your hand into the paste to create gloves and leave it on for several minutes before washing it away.

Q: To quickly peel tomato skins off of tomatoes,
O: (A) bring a pot of water to a rolling boil on the stove top.  Drop a ripe tomato into ice water to blanch it. The process of blanching the tomato in boiling water first and then cooling it in ice water is the correct method to peel the skin off easily.

Blanching the tomato in boiling water first helps to loosen the skin, and then cooling it in ice water stops the cooking process and makes it easier to peel off the skin. Using your hands to peel the skin off is a practical and efficient method.

Blanching the tomato in boiling water first helps to loosen the skin, making it easier to peel off. Submerging the tomato in ice water after blanching stops the cooking process and further aids in peeling the skin off. Using your hands to peel the skin off is a practical and efficient method.

Blanching the tomato in boiling water first helps to loosen the skin, and then dropping it into ice water stops the cooking process and makes it easier to peel off the skin. Using your hands to peel the skin off is a practical and efficient method.
